title: Not 100% fair...
text: Altho I love this app & play it all the time, I do agree that it is rigged in some sort of way. There are just way too many shots that have sunk the white or 8 ball when I know for a fact they shouldn’t have. I’m also confused about the “cash”, it’s pretty much pointless along with buying coins- both just used to take your money. You’re forced to up your cue AND buy new ones (even tho they were won in the boxes-which is another pointless aspect). My biggest complaint tho is that there are a few positions on the board that you simply can not make a shot within 10 seconds because your finger moves the slightest and the cue spins in circles or the like. Totally unfair, I’m sure you guys could’ve done better than that! Point is- if you like another pool game don’t waste your time with this one. Fun but equally annoying.

title: False ‘Connection’ Issues
text: I really like playing this game and have been for years. I’ve even put money in it here and there. What made me stop playing is that I’m constantly getting connection issues when there is no issue with my connection. And it happens in the middle of a game where the stakes are high. I can be shooting the last ball and oops connection issue or the game freezes and then when the game comes back I’ve lost my turn. Or after i win the game, it freezes and goes back to the last shot as if I didn’t win and then the time runs out causing me to lose. So frustrating! I play many other games and never have connection or freezing issues like I have with this game. Please fix this bug so I can re-install this game again. Thank you!

title: 8 Ball Pool
text:
I love the game. However, I have hit shots that have been negated, with the turn being given over to the opponent, causing me to lose games. Also, while believing I am playing an opponent, I was really playing the computer, under a opponents name. With this, the opponent's shot time is always wound down to the last seconds. Moreover, time has run punt on an opponent's shot, but his late shot will still count. While, if I run the clock-shot down to the limit, my shot is forfeited. When I am winning a game, the app always unnecessarily delays my shots. With these defects, it makes this game very unpleasant & stressful. However, I've seen no other pool app as realistic as this one. It's a shame such a virtually dynamic champion of an app/game, is ruined by the obvious disadvantages set-forth by the producers.
    Cheats on shots. Places balls u pot, back on table, & when u pot 8-ball on breaks, places it back on table.
    This is the most fun pool game, but it will (noticeably) cheat you out of games. If there was a more fun pool game, I would ditch this one in a heartbeat.

title: Great game.
text: This is an excellent game and I would recommend it if you like playing pool. I have it both on my phone and my IPad. Sometimes it is frustrating but that's only when I shoot like crap but when I'm on it's great as with anything. When you play 1 on 1 it matches you with someone who is very close, if not the same level as yourself. In a tournament it pits you against people of all different levels which is fine. Overall I am addicted. I have been playing this game since it came out. Anyone who tries to compare this game to real life pool is out of their mind but for learning a few basics it’s fine. Playing with English on this game gives you a good indication of what it would do on a real table. I play this and real pool on leagues and tournaments. Just don’t be like some people and expect an app to imitate real life.

title: There’s a few issues… but the game’s great
text: So the game is AWSOME!!! But there’s a few problems… so first of all, I think the game’s sort of cheating u out of ur money… After reading IMAUSERNOMORE’s comment, I thought that he was kinda right but not in the way that he said… The no network thing when he had network NEVER happens to me but sometimes the game does give u INSANELY GOOD robots at the game, and then u loose your coins and then maybe money if u have purchased In-game money. So I think it would help if u put maybe about 4 buttons on your screen, the first button saying “easy” the second one saying “medium”the third one saying “hard” and the last one saying “INSANE” and all of the buttons appear on your screen right b4 (before) the round starts or something like that so ima rate this 4 stars! P.S. I just wanna make a shout-out to IMAUSERNOMORE bc he really inspired me to right this comment.

title: Glitches
text:
This game is great, but it has glitches! There are a few things i hate about this game! if you are playing a million dollar table it does not have “call the pockets” so players just hit the cue ball where ever and it goes in the pocket that they weren’t even aiming for! I lost a lot of games that way and it should be fix! Second thing is they should have more tables to where your rank should be equally ranks with your opponent. I shouldn’t be playing a player that is a 100x better than me and I don’t even get a chance to shoot! Third is if its like pool make it like pool, if you break and the 8 ball gores in the pocket you should automatically win just like 9 ball! 

The tournament win streak game’s especially the ones when you have to win multiple games in a row to get your points up. I do not understand how players have hundred of thousand of points when the tournament just starts. That gives no average player a chance to win! You should have different ranks for that tournament just saying!

The last thing is the pool sticks. You should either be able to trade in your pool sticks for cash, more points to upgrade, or a gift box that is equal to your sticks grade. Any stick at “MAX LEVEL” should be trade able! 

I am giving it 3 stars for this reason. Fix the glitches thats the worst when you millions of coins on the line!

title: Needs a new update for pool pass
text: I love playing eightball pool. I play it every day. I rated it four stars instead of five though because I feel like you guys should have a new update for the game and make the feature as an addition be just like fortnight does and call of duty mobile does their battle pass offers you the option of building up points or tokens which can be used the following battle pass towards purchasing it. Instead of always having to pay money directly off of my card or money in general for it each time a new battle pass comes out, so it’s just some thing that maybe you guys should think about offering. If this feature does end up becoming available me along with the rest of my friends and clan members that play would change our rating to a five star. Please add this addition!!

title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS GAME
text: It is frustrating that the glitch in the systems makes you lose all your coins and affects your rating. It has been increasingly frustrating. It used to do it once and awhile, now it seems to have increased. Today was worse than ever. I spent time building up my coins and rating and then the glitch caused me to lose it all. This happened multiple times: I took my shot and either won the game or was close to winning. Then the “glitch” happens. To explain it best, the glitch symptoms causes the game to act as if I never took the shot at all. I watch the 8 ball go into the pocket and wait from my congratulations and coins, only to find that it was as if the shot never happened and my opponent now has “ball-in-hand” and he wins the game. I can understand if these things happen once in awhile, but it was almost every game. I had plenty of time on my shot clock too, so don’t try to blame it on that. I went from $280k worth of coins to $100 because of this glitch on games that should have been won on my game winning shots. Complete disappointment.

title: App will bend rules to cause you to lose progress
text: I have multiple times accidentally clicked on a match to try and back out which it appears to allow you to do. You go back to the menu for selection of games only to find that your gold is already taken and they throw you into the match anyways. I lost 100k even though I backed out before I had a partner matched so all the actual hard work I had was for a dumb glitch that the developers don’t seem to care about fixing. It seems that that along with other glitches that multitudes of other reviews on here are explaining, this app doesn’t seem to have the success it used to. It needs some massive updating or it just isn’t worth it. Unless pushing users to spend money on packs is what the app developer is all about which is greedy and ridiculous because the purchase packs and offers to purchase are thrown in your face. The fact that there are multitudes of bad reviews explaining these problems and nothing is being done about it is just poor responsibility on the developers part.

title: Good game but rigged
text: The game is good but there are a number of things they do to try and trick you into buying stuff. The stuff you pay for is a rip off and you really don’t need it. I have over 4 billion in coins and I have never bought anything. They sell 2 million in coins for $100. The wheel spins and scratches never win anything significant. The boxes also rarely give you anything of value. I think some games may give you unfortunate rolls to cause you to lose more games. I say this because even the best players only have a little over a 50% win rate.  The game also constantly crashes... makes me wonder if is because I win a lot and they have to have a way to keep me from playing since I don’t buy anything. The game is setup to try and get you to buy stuff. I would rather pay for the game and it be fair than deal with all the scams and tricks. The game itself is fun just don’t let their tactics convince you to buy stuff.

title: Pretty good
text:
It’s a fun game but it constantly has errors with the coins. If you win you often don’t win the prize money. If you have the coins it sometimes won’t let you play because it says you’re out of coins. Then sometimes it just forgets all your coins and gives you zero. This last one got me to quit because you can’t play any good tables without some coin.

It also has tons of random bugs. Often you can’t aim properly. It cue will move right then left all while trying to move the same way. The direction you need to shoot isn’t possible. Even when it’s an open table with nothing blocking. Other times it aims just fine. The shot power is totally random because it will release the shot while sliding down the power bar. Often just tapping the cue and losing your shot without shooting.  Sometimes it just shoots randomly while you are aiming.  If they fixed these things it would be a good game. I don’t think they really care about it though, it’s been like this a long time.

title: This game used to be fun
text:
This game is changing rapidly and becoming more and more pay to play. Now if you want to do anything you have to pay real money. Also I am quite sure that they use an algorithm that attempts to deplete the coin balances of players that have bought coins because as soon as you start getting a decent amount of coins, you all of a sudden can’t join a game unless it is against someone 100+ levels higher than you and with a 75% win percentage. Also thinks like breaking... I have used he same break in this game forever, but as soon as I paid, this break stopped potting balls. There have also been violations of the games physics, and bounces that just do not make sense and end up costing me a turn or even the game. Coincidentally, once this happens you start getting bombarded even more with the “Here’s a new deal! Buy more coins to level up!” 

So long story short, either don’t get the game or do not buy any coins. Because as soon as your name is in their system as someone who is willing to pay, your games will be rigged. 

Come on miniclip.

title: Very nice time killer
text:
In my experience with 8 ball it has been really nice ofc theirs going to be adds but it’s not awful, you won’t get bombarded with them every time you go through the different game modes like many other game apps. The developers do a really good job so it actually makes you want to spend actual money and when you do you get your money’s worth. The multiplayer system is really great as well sometimes you get the occasional high ranking player but even then skill recognizes skill which a really great factor if your keen on always having a challenge but if your playing to have a good time that’s okay too. 

All in all a really enjoyable experience! I would recommend this game to anyone who’s bored or has absolutely nothing to do and just enjoys playing pool.

title: BEST GAME EVER
text: It is a fun game and is easy enough for you and me and You start with 1,000 I think If was a long time ago when I started it but I am sure anyway it is a game you can play with me when you are bored when I am bored this game will make you not bored it is the BEST I can tell when I first played it was hard but the more you play it the easier it is cause then you are used to it 🥰 and much more you can make friends on this game and play with them don’t worry you will have many friends in this game ☺️ but to let you know when you are playing you have to give some coins and who wins gets those coins 🪙 easy I win a lot cause I think I have played it for a year now 😁I am on level 8 but that does not mean you are a noob you are great 😌 I hope you do sooo good 👍 have Fun 🤩

title: Dark patterns to hook you
text: This game lures you in with a false sense of security. First you’re a trainee, then you are a beginner before becoming a student. For the trainee and beginner tiers, it feels like you are playing against a bad player, but in fact you’re playing against a clever a.i. that looks, moves and feels like a real player but is programmed to let you win, to get that rush of excitement going in you and make you feel unbeatable. In fact, if you drop your win rate below a certain point, this a.i. becomes even more obvious and it more obviously a set up to hook you in. After dropping my win rate below 33 percent whilst a trainee, my “opponent” purposefully aimed one of it’s ball to ricochet off the 8 ball and sink it into a pocket. This was his first move and the act was obvious. Bravo, devs but also shameful. I guess you’re just that desperate for what little ad revenue you can get from the free to play people while suckering others into spending money to get the best cue, because surely that’s all you need to win the next game. 👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻👎🏻

title: 8 Ball pool - horrible
text:
I actually thought for once found a game that’s Fun and somewhat fair look we all know these creators of these games are in it for the love of creating and to make some money but as soon as you buy some coins the entire game changes I mean they don’t even try and make it look like maybe the person is better than you the balls are on a program where they move from position to position so the programmed person could win I don’t know how many times I seen a white ball roll in between 13 other balls to land right in front of the pocket ...
I’m only writing because I don’t want this game to go away like so many other games I’m not a complete idiot I understand you guys are probably just gonna let it run as long as it can to make as much money as it can then on to the next PLEASE DONT LET THIS GAME FAIL I REALLY LIKE IT

title: Very addicting game but.....
text: This game overall is a very fun and addictive to play but every now and then when I’m playing a match it seems like someone might be hacking or something ,like for instance I recently played in one of the tournaments and on the first match after I breaked the balls seemed to move to a different spot then where they landed when I broke, and then the match after when it was my turn and I potted my ball all of a sudden it switched to the other players turn when it shouldn’t have since the white ball didn’t even get potted when I potted my ball in. So like I said before this game is a really good game that is why I rate it 4 stars and I would rate it 5 stars if there wasn’t issues like this in the game whether it be a hacker or a bug it just really messes up the whole experience for me when matches like that happen.

title: Stupid.
text: This game is stupid. For one thing, I one 10,000 coins, and it all went to this stupid piggy bank thing, which you have to pay like five dollars to open. So all of your hard earned money in the game goes to the dumb pig and then you have spend hard earned money in real life. Another thing is that whenever I hit a good shot, it goes to the loading screen and I have to do the shot again even after I got the ball in which is really stupid. I’ll just make a fake ID and go to the bar and I play. I’d rather do that than play this stupid stupid stupid game. Also, it promotes itself way too much. Like when you earn coins it asks you to tweet or put a post on Facebook saying that you won “free coins”. You have to pay to spin a dumb wheel, get a dumb scratch off thing, or make a dumb shot to get a dumb prize. You literally have to pay for everything. It isn’t like real pool at all, either. If you’ve played real 8-ball like, ever, then you’d know that this isn’t realistic at all. Anyway, this game is dumb and stupid. Bye.

title: This needs to fixed ASAP!
text: It’s a great game to play but for some reason, after I’ve played a 2 games in London it always drops me 1000 coins. And this has happened at least 5 times. I went from 21,000 to 20,000 to 19,000 by only playing 5 London games when the entry fee is just 50 coins. I got back 1000 coins from the free spin on the wheel which then brought me back up to 20,000 but then after I played just a few more games in London and Sydney yesterday it went back down to 19,000 and then today I looked at my amount of coins and it said 19,875 so I played another game whose entry fee was only 50 coins and then when I came back out of that game after winning, it said 18,925. This is really making me mad because I just got up to this amount and it feels like I’m going to keep getting cheated out of my coins every single time.

title: Love this game
text: Ok so there is a few glitches once in a while. And your stuff is too pricey. I would of weather paid for the game... sorry but no offense. I have been playing this game since is was 3 years old and I am now 10 I am a 7 year user. I absolutely would recommend this game. It is fun very addictive too. One thing I don’t like about this you can type chat friends. I don’t like people from different countries chatting with me even thought they are not on my friends list but I am on there friends list. I really don’t like that... but over the years there has been a few glitches. Game has not been too hard and not too easy. I also love every new update. Still waiting for a new one!!! I would definitely recommend this app. Thanks for 8 ball guys I will see if I can find any more apps from you producers.

title: Get IT!
text:
Awesome awesome game there is one glitch, I just played a game , 200 coins , came down to my last ball, I made. The shot and also made the 8 ball, the game should have been mine but I lost the 200 coins, I sunk my ball first and planned to sink the 8 ball to, you don't have to call the pocket in this game. But otherwise it's the best game I've played and takes skill! One thing I don't like is people can leave you hanging for some reason,I can't nor do I want to, but while my shot clock is running , there's is stopped and you wait and wait and then they come back with no lost shot time! I do believe there are some cheaters out there! 
Just played a game with a player named Maicol , when it came my turn to shoot there was no pull back windows to draw the cue, so I ran out of time lost the game with no chance to shoot, Glitch ? Or cheat?

title: Fun but...
text:
8 Ball Pool is a fun game at it’s core, the controls are simple and are quite possibly the best of most pool apps.
There are some issues however that ruin the fun one of which is the imbalance of pool cue stats, stats that lose charge and must be recharged using in game currency. Secondly, the currency itself is an issue, the game is stingy, in order to make more chips you must play for higher stakes, sounds normal at first until you realize that people are practically unbeatable if you’re fairly new to the game. 
My third issue with the game is the fact that if you aren’t breaking the rack there’s a good chance you won’t get a turn during your game, you’ll just be sitting there watching while some bot or skillful player beats you without you even having a chance to do anything whatsoever. Game is BS, if you play this make sure you play perfectly, don’t miss, if you don’t steamroll your opponent they will steamroll you and then you can kiss your chips goodbye! DO NOT spend your real world money on this game!

title: This is a joke
text: If you’re looking for a free to play, fun casual pool game, you’re at the wrong game. First of all, you need coins to even play online. This is OK, until you bet all of your money and loose. After that, you literally can’t play online until you get more coins. This is uselessly frustrating and a check on the pay to play list. Next, you have the cues. You can dump hundreds of dollars into this game to buy the best cue. Not only does it look cool, but it literally gives you an unfair advantage because of the statistics. Yeah that’s right, another check on the pay to play list. Finally, the unfair balancing. So as you win more games, you gain more exp. This exp is then used to level you up. It’s supposed to keep players you play against on the same level, but this is no where near reliable. Every now and then, you’ll get people that are 5 levels ahead of you and that’s OK I guess... but then you go against that guy 12 levels ahead of you. Yeah to unfair advantages! So in conclusion, if you really want to play fun casual pool, buy your own pool table.

title: Trash.
text: Literally until you get thousands of coins, the game is a slop-fest where kids with no skill win games that they shouldn’t. The in-game physics change COMPLETELY from game to game. Zero consistency. I have been reduced to using the “beginner cue” because no matter what power level I select to shoot a shot with, there is zero consistency using a different cue from game to game. In addition, I lost 12 games in a row because I wasn’t allowed to break a SINGLE TIME. As a result, my opponents ran the table without me be allowed to shoot. 12 games? Without breaking? Come on. I grind and grind to get coins, then at no fault of my own, because I’m not allowed to break and run the table for 12 games in a row, I lose 99% of my coins. Really. If you have installed, uninstall. If you haven’t downloaded yet, don’t waste your time. The ENTIRE team responsible for the coding in this game should be fired. Literally trash physics coding, trash matchmaking, and trash equality algorithms. Just trash. Don’t waste your time. Miniclip is a company full of absolute idiots who shouldn’t have jobs. Literal trash human beings.

title: Very fun!
text: I don’t like games. But I love this one. I think 8 ball pool is my favorite thing to do when im bored. I definitely recommend it, and if you are second guessing yourself on getting it, even if you have no storage, get it!! It’s so worth it, and honestly I don’t have anything to fix. Well the prices, I want this one pool cue, but it’s 2 million coins!! If it was way less, they would have more benefit for the game. They are trying to get people to pay their OWN money, but some of it is just unaffordable. Other than that, I love this game and it’s good for all ages. I have one question, why can’t you create a mini clip account anymore?? I hope mini clip answers my question, but I absolutely recommend this game, and I can’t stop playing it. In fact im going to play it right now, bye!!

title: James
text:
I fell in love with a player called James. I played two games with him and right away, I feel for him. after that, I tried everything to friend him. But alas, it was not meant to be. I will forever search this game for the husband that never was. I wrote this totally original poem to show how much I long for him, and need to friend him. “What is a maiden to do without her knight? Without her knight her life has no light. Yet, lonely in a sea of knights, a single James awaits his wife. He has searched every castle, every cave, every room, looking for thy bride to accompany thy groom. They search for each other, each and every day, to reunite their lives. Each day he prays that he will find thy wife. What is a maiden to do without her knight? Without her knight her life has no light. Yet, lonely in a sea of knights, a single James awaits his wife.”

 Other than that friending issue, great game! 4 stars :)

title: Play Free
text:
Pros: Love the game, realistic ball action, very addictive. 
Cons: Absolutely will put you in bot matches, gameplay can and will be manipulated, unseen to most, but I noticed irregular gameplay/action not in my favor, particularly with the cue ball. I also was playing in a Jakarta match(50K) and received a phone call that was quickly dismissed, but when gameplay resumed, I was on a Shanghai table and could not back out. Lost 1 Million in coins that I fortunately did not pay for, but had won in gameplay. To replace it would be one hundred US dollars. Pass. Tech support is involved and they are reviewing the issue. I will rate accordingly. Enjoy as a free game. Also since the game was installed my phone sometimes types on its own and menus switch during gameplay when the screen is not being touched. Have fun.

title: Accurate Review
text: Ok, I’ve been playing this game for about 2-3 weeks, it is a good pool game, there is money that you have a CHOICE to bet, some or most people making reviews on this game should be aware that yes, you do lose money but you have a choice to bet high or low, if you keep losing over and over and over again that is a sign that you should practice or realize that you shouldn’t of bet all that money, that is what I did and I have 25k (I did not buy any of it with REAL money) which for someone who stared 2 and a half weeks ago that is a good balance. I have played and I have won quite a bit, you just have to be good to win and there some times (not all the time) that i have been robbed. But if your looking to get this game it is free, and there is not many ads, anyway I would prefer getting it, it is a awesome game.

title: Question ?
text:
I’ve had 8-ball for about 4 years now and have never had a issue with the game. Always loved it very much and enjoyed playing people from different countries and friends who are online... but recently I’ve started having issues 😔 for some reason anytime a friend sends me a request to play them it will tell them “ your friend needs to update to the newest version of 8-ball before playing with friends” and when I send a request it tells me I need to update before playing friends ... I have no update shown for 8-ball in my App Store ... how can I get this new update when my phone isn’t telling me it needs to be updated.. every time I search 8ball in my App Store it
Says “ open “ to open the game not “ update” I’m pretty smart when it comes to devices but I can’t seem to figure this one out 🤨

title: ICONS
text:
I really enjoy playing this game but I do have a complaint. I feel those icons should be taken off this app. When trying to make a shot the opponent puts an icon up and it blocks the direction I am shooting the ball and blocks the pocket I am wanting the ball to go into!!! There is a time limit everyone has to shoot the ball. If you do not have much time left to shoot the ball waiting for the icon to go away only uses up that time. I have spoken to several players about this and they have said basically the same thing as I said. I think those icons are ridiculous!!!!
Get rid of those stupid icons!!!!
When playing against an opponent and if they keep putting those icons up while I’m trying to shoot the ball I QUIT THE GAME!!!! 
Lucky for them I can not message them!!!!!

title: R I G G E D
text: If I could give zero stars I would. I am a long time faithful and loyal 8 Ball pool player, i don’t even condone the 8 Ball on the iMessage app but seeing the transition on how rigged Miniclip has made this game it is becoming unenjoyable. When it started from the simple Daily Spins I didn’t mind because it was free but when Miniclip decided it wasn’t going to payout certain cash prizes for watching adds that’s when my patience started to grow short with the game. Now when you play some of the plays/shots i’ve seen in the game just doesn’t make any sense. And for this i don’t even bother making any in app purchases, watching adds, or testing out any of their “free trials”. I feel Miniclip is losing their authenticity for the in app purchases which is ridiculous because 8 Ball Pool was a great game when it first came with minimal rigged mechanics done to the game. So if anyone’s has another pool that can come correct in terms of mechanism please inform me, because I’ve about had it the unfairness and rigid system that Miniclip is displaying within a once top selling free game.

title: Update has a minor flaw
text:
Enjoyed the game until I updated with the latest version. Had no idea why, with this new version, I had pool table rails and pockets that didn’t line up correctly. It was only after I disabled zoom on my phone that the game became usable again. Please make an update to the update that accounts for phones with zoom enabled. The old version worked flawlessly, except for the glitches that have already been discussed in numerous other reviews. Do this and I’ll change my review accordingly. 
As of now, I’m out $10 because I lost all my chips fiddle-farting with this glitch.

Update: Thanks for fixing the glitch.  Now, could someone please work on fixing the timer? It seems as though I (and my opponents) don’t always get the allotted time to shoot a ball. This is very annoying at times, especially when it boils down to the last shot. Thanks!

title: Warning problem
text: I’ve been recently getting a warning saying that I’ve been transferring coins through accounts , falsely saying that I’ve been cheating, or just exploiting the game. Iam only giving invites to my wife or my friends in game. We play fairly, we aren’t cheating, my wife also got the warning, I’ve also realized a change in our money , for no reason. I don’t like being falsely accused for just playing the game. Also it saids that was the final warning even though I never got the warning before. I’ll stop playing this game. And also got my money fairly and legally by playing or watching the ad’s by the app’s rules. I’ve also was getting charged from my money when I haven’t paid for anything. I won’t recommend this app anymore to my friends.

title: So rigged!
text: This was my favorite game for a couple weeks. I was winning about 60% of the time. I was trying very hard to improve and I could tell I was getting better. I love that!! And then something happened… I guess the game didn’t like how much fun I was having. It was fun because I always believed I had a chance to win. All of a sudden I started missing shots I could easily make before and my opponents were making shots that were almost impossible. It’s like I was playing a bot that was designed to be just good enough to almost always win. And the funny thing was it started happening once I made an in app purchase. To me the game is designed to go after people that it thinks will fork over money. And that’s when the game was absolutely ruined for me. Im a capitalist and I believe everybody needs to make money but when you get the feeling your being cheated that’s not good. Too bad because this could be such a fun game. Instead of being fun it’s purely frustrating. I will have to find another game.

title: So-so rating
text:
Game plays well mostly.    However, I do not appreciate the many subtle tricks the designers use to take your hard earned coins away from you.   It just stinks when you lose 10 million coins because the default bets are set to the highest amounts.  It’s too easy to push the wrong button and get cheated out of several months winnings.    These pitfall traps make me want to stop playing and I have now quit playing for the second time.   Waste of time if we are to be cheated out of our hard earned coins.    

Often the opponents playing levels are set so high that you can never win for stretches.   Especially if you have been playing well or decide to bet a lot.    It’s nearly impossible to average over 65% wins overall also.    

Anybody halfway intelligent knows that they are playing against the computer.    Disgusting and frustrating.   You have a good game here so WHY do you mess it up with subtle tricks and cheats???     I may never play again until you clean these things up.

title: Is this some kind of a joke
text: I’ve been playing pool for over 40 years and I’ve never seen it played like this before! When potting  the 8 ball on the break you win that’s the object of being able to break! Feels like I’m being cheated every time I play. From feeling like I’m playing a robot to not being able to connect to friends or able to receive free coins and if you are able to collect free coins you’re given 15 at a time W0W Thanks but no thanks This ai saturated game is a waste of time! If there was a way to put minus stars I would give it a minus 10 star rating! It’s mind boggling that someone could get away with this crap in this day and age! I can honestly say this game offends me!!! Posting some videos and pics on Facebook since you’re so adamant on sending me reminders on my feed asking for me to invite my friends but I’ll be steering them as far from this dead end street as I can! I haven’t seen something this rigged since the 2020 United States presidential elections. it must be some kind of practical joke! Where are the cameras? Not L0L!

title: 8ball pool
text: Honestly...I believe this game is RIGGED...The gameplay isn’t all that & for it to be pool on mobile it doesn’t seem to be accurate at all, You can play for 20k coins and get on a 7 win streak but soon as you play for 1M it’s like you don’t even have a chance for a turn...(RIGGED) I thought the game was pretty cool at first although, once I’ve played it enough to realize these don’t even be real people in the high coined games...Most of them are BOTS...(DO NOT GET FOOLED) This game is inaccurate and I personally believe it either needs an update or needs to be taking off of the apple play store because of its FALSE Descriptions...It says (play others online) but really unless ur playing an actual friend that you know, half of the time these aren’t actual real people from across the world....If ur reading this I’m sure you may feel the same way a lot of times believe it or not THIS GAME IS COMPLETELY RIGGED and whoever came up with the gameplay needs to make some serious changes because in a way, it’s false advertising

title: Write a script!
text:
This game was good. Was. Now it’s just a big, fat freaking commercial that always -always! - tries to trick you into spending your coins on something. My favorite ripoff is how after a game, instead of getting you set up and ready to play the same game again as you would naturally be ready to do, it automatically sets you up to play in a game that’s at your max level of coins. Too fast and excited and tap your finger, ready to go? You just bet your entire bank on your skills in a game you likely wouldn’t have tried. Nice job, sucker!

Moreover, I am beyond tired of getting “matched” into high stakes games with people who are 25, 50, and yes, even 100 levels higher than me. This is, of course, after I drop a bunch of coins to play a game and now I’m stuck. Just. Why? What’s the point of levels if this is the result? It’s the freaking Wild West! Write a dang script that prevents being matched with another person 10-20 levels higher. Enough! 

WAS a great game. Bout done with this one!

title: Never seen so much cheating in my life
text: If you want to play a normal, fair game of pool then forget this app! It's LOADED with bots!! The balls will skip and/or move right in front of your eyes! You can barely tap a ball and the cue ball will end up hitting 3 rails and falling into a pocket?!? Does anyone from America play this?? I was on for about a half hour earlier and must have played 14 Mohammads! Some are on level 32 others 398 either way I get beat! Every single time I have three balls left on 9 ball as soon as I hit the first one the cue ball miraculously finds a way to scratch! When I say every single time I mean it. This is the biggest cheating joke of a game Ever! It would be so much fun if these foreign bots weren't constantly involved. I had 3 million bucks and started playing the 60k tournament last week ... I'm on level 118 and I've yet to win one round even if I play a level 20 person! I now have a little over 2 million because I couldn't believe that I wasn't winning at least one single round and kept trying n trying . God I hate this game !!!! BAN MINICLIP!!

title: dont spend mone.... is rigged
text: I play a littel real pool so I understand the logic of it, and I know is an app but this game is ridiculously rigged, once I bought a .99 cent thing, the game change completly, like I  will put the 8 ball in to win with a little  tap and i will scratch in the oposite side of the table with a impossible mathematics shoy.... another time, all balls in, like no ball on the table but the 8, mi oponent missed his shot and in my turn  it says tha hittin the 8 was ilegal(🚫), I ignore it, put the 8 in, didn't scratch, and my oponent won.  in many other times my oponent will hit the ball hard and put two or three balls in with an impossible shot, like violating all laws of physics, angles, trajectories and trigonometry. is not even a   luck based game because never happens to me.  this are just a few of the many many incidents that this happened and amost always my oponent is a gest or somebody with an odd name an no picture or a cartoon pictur.... for the developer you owe me money or something to even the odds ( you know what I  mean )

title: Download this instead of those other fancy games
text:
I've been playing this game on and off for years now and it still is one of my favorite games ever made for the iPhone, and one of the most used apps on my phone of over 100 apps/games. 

The gameplay physics are the most realistic I have ever seen from a pool game, and as an avid player of "real" pool/billiards i can safely say that this is probably as close as you can get to the real thing on a phone. The match play is great as you can play w friends from Facebook or online against people from around the world. 

The developers have added lots of unlockable gear that keep the game interesting, like cues, chatpacks, and skins. These can be purchased with ingame currency or real money. 

The only real downside and area i would ask developers to improve on is to make more features available without having to use real money. I have been playing for several years now and my in-game coins/cash accumulation is slow because i refuse to spend real cash on the game. Developers: please add more features and items that are reasonably priced and attainable through in-game currency. Longtime players like myself should not have to pay to keep playing. Otherwise great app and will provide years of entertainment, especially if you like pool like i do.

title: Game is Biased
text: So read carefully to understand the reason of my statement. The game is actually very entertaining and I would say it’s addictive if you really like pool. Everything goes well until you take it seriously and you want to aim for the higher tables, here is when it gets frustrating because unless you’re able to constantly make purchases in the game you will be good, but otherwise be prepared to observe how biased it gets in favor of those who spend money in the game like buying the pool pass or other perks available. It is just unbelievable how others are able to perform some plays that will never happen to those that doesn’t spend money in the game. Again, the game is fun and if you just want to play a couple of games with friends or family you’re good to go. But if you’re expecting to level up and get the best out of it, have your credit card ready to spend every single day. That way, you will for sure be able to beat others in the higher tables.

title: A fatal flaw
text: Overall this game is fun to play and has good graphics and physics. Unfortunately this game has two serious problems which combine to make one fatal flaw. The first problem is that the player matching system acts way too quickly often providing literally zero opportunity to back out of a game and matching a player with someone of dramatically higher rank, sometimes multiple times higher. The second is that clicking away the pop ups often has you accidentally start a match which sets you up with the most expensive possible game. Combined with the first problem you will occasionally be forced to play someone for nearly all your in-game money who may be significantly more skilled and experienced than you. This has happened to me about 7 times in a couple months, and twice I effectively lost all my money. As much as I love the actual gameplay I don’t want to play while this problem exists.

title: Meh
text:
This app is fine if you’re playing it in a waiting room at the dr’s office, but that’s about it. When playing 1 on 1, it will always say “waiting for opponents response” after the initial break, making me believe there is a bot on the other end. There are specific tournaments that for some reason bring such high level “players” despite the fact of costing the least out of the lineup. I’ve played against almost 200 level players as a level 30! There are more than often games where you will only get one turn. 

You can pay a ridiculously large sum of money if you’d like to gain some serious coin to play with- but you’ll probably end up losing it rather quickly. 

It’s fun and the cues are really fun to unlock and upgrade, but beware of the auto recharge. I was hurting for coins and my cue in use was set to auto recharge, taking all of my coins in the process.

title: 9 Ball
text: I think you guys have done a great job on the 9 ball but think that there are a few things you could do to improve it, I shoot pool all the time and know that there could be a 3 foul rule added to make it harder and a push after the break, I mean I shoot with pros like Johnny Archer and Janet Atwell to name a few and know there is more to the game, also u could make the pool pass games like the Gala going on now 9 hall instead of 8 hall all the time. You guys have done a great job so far with all this but time to go to the next level I think myself. Also on 8 ball need to stop the illegal breaks if I remember correctly you still have to hit the head ball in an 8 ball break only games I know u don’t have to is one pocket and straight pool. Thank you for your time and great job so far hope to see some changes soon to some of these games

title: Pure crap after update
text: I liked this game when I was bored for a long time. After this update, if you win too much without paying real money for currency, it starts glitching and doing weird things like disconnecting you after to run the table and are about to win giving winning shot to opponent or the cue ball just suddenly changes direction to make you scratch over and over and over. You have to win 80 percent of your games to break even after what you lose from glitches and being disconnected when close to winning. I read reviews with others complaining of this but now I saw it for myself. They purposely make you lose if you get ahead by winning instead of buying in game cash. Went from fun game to one that makes me want to throw my iPad at the wall. My brand new Samsung tablet with only 1 other app on it crashes with this game before I even join a table over and over. I never spent $ on this game and it most def won't happen by robbing me with bullsh$t programming to drain my money. Nice try kill yourself 8ball pool

title: Beware
text:
Amazing game and graphics!
Have been playing for several years. 
Bought stuff early on, just to add my support knowing they have millions of subscribers. 
Suddenly, I am certain that since I don’t buy any of their virtual products, I’m not allowed to play my game. My shots are controlled and diverted by (AI?) artificial intelligence, algorithms, who knows, but I warn you that at some point, unless you buy, you can’t make any progress. As obvious as making a shot that goes in, and suddenly, the ball is placed outside the pocket right on the edge. Not funny and infuriating! I play real pool and that, wouldn’t ever happen. 
Buy the game and enjoy it, you’ll love it. Just be aware that the moment you stop buying, they’re going to ruin, not only your experience, but your moment. You opened the stupid app to have some fun or to kill some time, or both, only to watch them crush, destroy your every “masterful” move that you knew was going to be a path to a win.

title: Cheating is rampant
text: I have been playing this game for years. The higher games that you play, the more frequent, you’ll run into people cheating and hacking the game, and Miniclip does absolutely nothing to fix the problem. It seems they just don’t care about how bad the game has become because of these cheaters and hackers. there are apps and programs out there, that allow players to making possible shots, three bank shots with double kiss on the 8 ball, 2-3 bank shots on every single shot of a game, getting ball in hand after every single shot, turn all the balls into black squares, auto aiming to never miss a shot, etc. etc. Mini clip did add three dots on everybody’s profile pic so that you can report cheaters, but it seems every day there’s more and more out there. we noticed a club name that’s ranked number two, and their name contains the word hackers, and miniclip allows them to stay. And looking at the members of that club, at the beginning of the week they already had billions of coins won.

title: Waste of time
text:
This game, when working properly, would  be quite entertaining. However, the “slow connection” hoax has more effect on the game than a given players skill or that of their opponent; assuming you’re not playing some bot which is always possible too. 

It’s been my experience that somewhere between 8-13% of the games have the “slow connection” manufactured interruptions built in that causes, at a minimum, player to loose their turn or replay a shot you’ve already made; the latter usually occurs when you come back and have no time left. Same result, you loose your turn. I’ve actually tracked it and that’s the numbers… 8-13% depending on how close you may be to “leveling up”, extending winning streak or value of table stakes being played for. 

The end result is a bad experience, especially when one has purchased coins and gets cheated by the program. It must be made for idiots that would keep buying coins while getting blatantly robbed by built in “glitches”.  

Fortunately, I’ve not bought coins. Any reasonably good player can win more than they’re being robbed of;  but hey, the game is free so you’re getting what you pay for. I’d not bet a penny of real money on a program filled with built in ways to perpetuate fraud! 

Seems as if the poker games are similar, with respect to “slow connection” issues causing players to magically disconnect during critical hands, usually when you’ve got the nuts!!

title: Funny reviews
text:
Some of the people reviewing are cracking me up. First of all, if you don’t like the game why did you give it 5 stars...

Anyhow, overall this is a good pool game. No forced videos to watch which is a huge plus. There is an obvious push to buy coin but you do not have to. The mini games to earn coin are completely rigged, but I’m not playing for those anyhow. Been playing for a while, I have made some serious coin and lost it all and come back a bit all while not paying one cent of real money! No one likes to lose, but I don’t think the game is cheating as some suggest. Learn to accept a loss people even to those with incredibly dumb luck. Just keep spamming the “unlucky” option and not doing the rematch—you will be fine. 

I do recommend this game: only real change I think they should make is the need to recharge your cue...I can lose coin on my own thanks.
